alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 1:27PM CDT until May 10 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Central Tipton County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Lauderdale County in west Tennessee... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 126 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Munford, or 8 miles south of Fort Pillow State Park, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Pillow State Park, Munford, Fulton, Gilt Edge, Drummonds, Beaver and Randolph. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
